summary: Multidisciplinary professional with IT support, network security, and security operations experience, plus hands-on coordination in high-pressure culinary environments. Proficient in technical help desk, CCNA, SCJD, UNIX/Linux, TCP/IP, and web content management. Seeking roles that leverage analytical problem solving, training, and cross-functional collaboration.

experience.title: Security Officer
experience.description: Patrolled facility; served as general security presence and deterrent; reported incidents and emergencies; monitored security cameras and alarm systems; issued badges; checked credentials and controlled access; observed and secured posts.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Collected customer feedback, implemented process changes to improve satisfaction; handled inquiries, provided information, and enforced policies; demonstrated mastery of customer service scripts.

experience.title: Aviation Mechanic / Military Police Officer
experience.description: Trained and instructed subordinates; managed ammunition processes; patrolled restricted areas; led MP teams in battlefield operations; maintained sensitive items and equipment; evaluated terrain and topography for operations.
